law.text: At the instance of the Department of Vehicle Regulation or of any person having an interest in the subject matter, the courts of this state may enjoin any person from violating any of the provisions of this chapter or other chapters relating to the operation or taxation of motor vehicles, or any order, rule, regulation or requirement of the department relating to such vehicles.
law.history: Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 5. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 45, effective June 15, 1950.
